0.name: Jailor
0.description: During the Day, you may choose one person to Jail for the Night.

1.name: Baker
1.description: Choose a player to Feed Bread to each Night.

2.name: Coven Leader
2.description: With the Necronomicon, you may choose to Attack someone each Night. You may choose to Retrain another Coven member or yourself.

3.name: Jester
3.description: Trick the town into voting against you.

4.name: Executioner
4.description: Choose a target at Night to visit marking them as your target.

5.name: Marshal
5.description: You may start a during the Voting phase.

6.name: Doomsayer
6.description: Select 3 players and guess their roles at Night.

7.name: Medusa
7.description: You may choose to Stone Gaze a player each Night.
